title: Definition of a Point Estimator
question_text: Which of the following correctly defines a point estimator?

choices.text: A point estimator is a parameter that provides an estimate of a sample statistic.
A point estimator is a parameter that provides an estimate of a population statistic.
A point estimator is a statistic that provides an estimate of a sample parameter.
A point estimator is a statistic that provides an estimate of a population parameter.
A point estimator is a statistic that is always equal to the parameter.
